slides.title: What is Percentage?
slides.content:
**Percentage** means 'per hundred' or 'out of 100'.

**Symbol:** %

**Example:** 50% means 50 out of 100 = 50/100 = 0.5

slides.title: Percentage Increase/Decrease
slides.content:
**Increase:** New Value = Old Value × (1 + r/100)

**Decrease:** New Value = Old Value × (1 - r/100)

**Example:** 200 increased by 10% = 200 × (1.10) = 220
